provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Local Industries (Safeguard-
ing) Regulations. 1966.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2.-(1) The period within which objections may be lodged under
subsection (4) of section 4 of the Act shall be-
      (a) in the case of an authority to whom the Minister's proposal
           has been referred under parapaph (b) of subsection (3) of the
           said section 4, within twenty-one days of the reference;
      (b) in the case of a person upon whom a copy of a notice has
           been served under paragraph (c) of subsection (3) of the said
           section 4, within twenty-one days after the service on such
           person of the notice; and
      (c) in the case of any other peuson, within seven days after the
           last publication of the notice required to be published under
           paragraph (a) of subsection (3) of the said section 4.
        (2) When the Minister has appointed a committee ih accordance
with subsection (4) of the said section 4, he shall notify the objector
of such appointment and of the date and time when, and the place
where, the committee will meet to enquire into and consider the ob-
jection.

provisions.title: Section 6
provisions.content:
6. Proper books of account shall be kept by every licensee in respect
of 'the operation of each of his factories and the Collector of Taxes
and any person authorized in writing by the Collector or by the
Minister shall have access to such books at all reasonable times.
